author: HANNAH KINSON hannah.kinson@magicvalley.com
title: PHOTOS: Plastic bags get a new life
text:
PHOTOS: Plastic bags get a new life
Students made sleeping mats and pillows out of donated plastic bags to give to the Magic Valley Humanitarian Center for the homeless Thursday, Feb. 15, 2024, during Random Acts of Kindness week at White Pine Elementary School in Burley.
